titleStmt.title: A commentary or, exposition vpon the diuine second epistle generall, written by the blessed apostle St. Peter. By Thomas Adams
titleStmt.author: Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Badger [and Felix Kyngston] for Iacob Bloome,

notesStmt.note: The second "volume" has separate title page with imprint "London, imprinted by Felix Kyngston for Iacob Bloome, 1633"; pagination recommences at 801 and register at 4A1.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Running title reads: An exposition upon the second epistle generall of S. Peter.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
